testcase.name: Verifying revision of the PO record in the Revised PO For Stock screen
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to Login page...........................................passed Given Login with the Production Manager.....................................passed And Click on the SignIn button..............................................passed Then Navigate to PO For Stock screen........................................passed When Click on the Revise PO button..........................................passed And Verify whether the page is navigated to Revised PO For Stock form.......passed
